Detailed Description

calculate one-body densities in coordinate and momentum space

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

  OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densx};

void calcDensitiesCoordinateParity ( const SlaterDet *  Q,
int  par,
int  v,

Definition at line 224 of file Densities.c.

References calcSlaterDetAuxod(), calcSlaterDetOBMEod(), copySlaterDet(), dim, freeSlaterDet(), freeSlaterDetAux(), initSlaterDet(), initSlaterDetAux(), invertSlaterDet(), k, SlaterDetAux::ovlap, and P.

Referenced by main().

{
  double nlr;
  complex double ovllr;
  complex double denslr[3*n*n];

  SlaterDet Ql, Qr;
  initSlaterDet(Q, &Ql);
  initSlaterDet(Q, &Qr);

  SlaterDetAux X;
  initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);

  densparameters P = { normal: v, npoints: n, range: x };
  OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densx};

  int ipl, ipr, k;

  nlr = 0;
  copySlaterDet(Q, &Ql);
  for (ipl=0; ipl<=1; ipl++) {

    if (ipl)
      invertSlaterDet(&Ql);

    copySlaterDet(Q, &Qr);
    for (ipr=0; ipr<=1; ipr++) {

      if (ipr)
        invertSlaterDet(&Qr);

      calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Ql, &Qr, &X);
      ovllr = X.ovlap;

      calcSlaterDetOBMEod(&Ql, &Qr, &X, &op_ob_dens, denslr);

      nlr += ((par == -1 && (ipl+ipr)%2) ? -1 : 1)* ovllr;

      for (k=0; k<3*n*n; k++)
        dens[k] += ((par == -1 && (ipl+ipr)%2) ? -1 : 1)* denslr[k];

    }

  }

  for (k=0; k<3*n*n; k++)
    dens[k] = dens[k]/nlr;

  freeSlaterDet(&Ql); freeSlaterDet(&Qr);
  freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
}
